communications.subject: Washington Public Records Act Request: North Fork Gravel Pit
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act I request the following records:

All records, documents, and internal communications pertaining to firearm use and lead management at the site known publicly as the "North Fork Gravel Pit" in Deming, Washington located at 48.8957, -122.1099 on parcel number 3905013022330000. This includes any and all communications and records regarding the use of the gravel pit as a shooting range and any management actions, considerations, or planning done by the Department of Natural Resources in response to that type of land use. Please also include work requests, tickets, and other relevant documentation of where and how materials excavated from the pit have been used for the last five years. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. In the event that there are fees please inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically using a cloud storage service or via email attachment if possible. 

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days as the statute requires.
